scripts.dev:web: npm run env:web && npx expo start --web
scripts.dev:android: npm run env:android && npx expo start --android
scripts.env:web: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); if (fs.existsSync('.env.web')) { fs.copyFileSync('.env.web', '.env'); console.log('✅ .env.web → .env'); } else { console.error('❌ .env.web 파일이 없습니다.'); }"
scripts.env:android: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); if (fs.existsSync('.env.android')) { fs.copyFileSync('.env.android', '.env'); console.log('✅ .env.android → .env'); } else { console.error('❌ .env.android 파일이 없습니다.'); }" && node -e "const fs = require('fs'); if (fs.existsSync('.env.local')) { const backup = '.env.local.backup'; if (!fs.existsSync(backup)) { fs.copyFileSync('.env.local', backup); } fs.unlinkSync('.env.local'); console.log('⚠️ .env.local을 임시로 백업했습니다 (.env.local.backup)'); }"
scripts.env:android:restore: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); if (fs.existsSync('.env.local.backup')) { fs.copyFileSync('.env.local.backup', '.env.local'); fs.unlinkSync('.env.local.backup'); console.log('✅ .env.local 복원 완료'); }"
scripts.build:web: npm run env:web && npx expo export --output-dir web-build --platform web
scripts.build:android:debug: npm run env:android && npx expo prebuild --platform android && cd android && .\gradlew assembleDebug && cd ..
scripts.build:android:release: npm run env:android && npx expo prebuild --clean --platform android && cd android && .\gradlew assembleRelease && cd ..
scripts.build:android:eas:preview: npm run env:android && eas build --platform android --profile preview
scripts.build:android:eas:production: npm run env:android && eas build --platform android --profile production
scripts.deploy: npm run build:web && node scripts/fix-gh-pages-html.js && gh-pages -d web-build -r https://github.com/devbwan/devbwan.github.io.git --dotfiles
scripts.logcat:save: powershell -NoProfile -Command "[Console]::OutputEncoding = [System.Text.Encoding]::UTF8; $OutputEncoding = [System.Text.Encoding]::UTF8; adb logcat | Out-File -Encoding UTF8 logcat.txt"
